mapper.insert: insert into sys_rule_factor_oper_type (id, operate_type, operate_value, operate_desc, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_rule_factor_oper_type set operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_value = #{operateValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_desc = #{operateDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, operate_type, operate_value, operate_desc, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_rule_factor_oper_type where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, operate_type, operate_value, operate_desc, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_rule_factor_oper_type

select id, operate_type, operate_value, operate_desc, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_rule_factor_oper_type where rec_stat='0'

select id, operate_type, operate_value, operate_desc, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_rule_factor_oper_type where 1 = 1
and operate_type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{operateType}),'%')
and operate_desc like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{operateDesc}),'%')
and operate_value like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{operateValue}),'%')
and rec_stat like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{recStat}),'%')
